summary: CypherSafe: A secure blockchain-based note-taking app with recovery system using 12-word phrases and QR codes
architectural_notes: 12-word mnemonic phrase (BIP39) or QR code for master key generation
Client-side key derivation for blockchain note encryption
Black & Gold themed premium UI for vault card display
QR code scanning capability for cross-device sync
PDF generation with password protection for key export
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium Black & Gold fortress lock icon for Vault Card header (vault-card-lock.dim_128x128.png)

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate Golden 12-Word Phrase or Master QR Code on first setup
Design premium Black & Gold Vault Card displaying master key with security message
Add 'Scan to Sync' option on login screen for QR scanning or manual 12-word entry
Display security warning before showing master key about data recovery limitations
Export master key as password-protected PDF or high-resolution printable image
Generate a 12-word mnemonic phrase (BIP39 standard) and corresponding Master QR Code during first-time user setup, after profile creation but before the main vault interface is shown

Design a premium 'Vault Card' component with Black & Gold theme displaying the master key (12-word phrase and QR code), including the security message: 'Your Master Key to the Fortress. Keep it offline. Keep it secret.'
Show a security warning dialog before displaying the master key that states: 'This is the only way to recover your data. If lost, even I cannot open your vault.'
Add 'Scan to Sync' option on the login screen allowing users to restore their vault by either scanning the Master QR Code or manually entering the 12-word phrase
Implement export functionality allowing users to save the Master Key as a password-protected PDF or high-resolution printable image
Store the 12-word phrase securely in the backend associated with the user's Principal identity to enable recovery verification and vault restoration
Integrate the master key display into the onboarding flow after ProfileSetup completion, showing the security warning followed by the Vault Card with export options
